alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:27PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Humboldt, northeastern Lander, west central Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 526 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Carlin to 22 miles north of Dunphy to 18 miles south of Midas to 10 miles northeast of Valmy. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Area Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
